name: thomas
culturalSignificance: The name Thomas has been widely used in Christian contexts due to Saint Thomas the Apostle, one of the twelve apostles of Jesus, known for his initial doubt about the resurrection of Jesus. It has also been a popular name in many English-speaking countries and across Europe, often associated with reliability and faith.
modernContext: Thomas remains a popular name in many countries, often ranking in the top 100 names for boys. It is favored for its classic and timeless appeal.
literaryReferences: Thomas is a common name in literature, notably appearing in works like 'Thomas the Tank Engine' and 'The Adventures of Tom Sawyer'.
personality: People named Thomas are often perceived as dependable, thoughtful, and intelligent. They are seen as leaders and are known for their analytical minds.
symbolism: The name Thomas symbolizes faith and skepticism, often associated with the biblical story of 'Doubting Thomas'.
funFact: Thomas is the name of a famous tank engine character in the children's book series 'Thomas & Friends', which has been beloved by children worldwide.

religiousSignificance.significance: Saint Thomas is known for his initial doubt about Jesus' resurrection, which led to the term 'Doubting Thomas'. He later became a strong believer and missionary.
religiousSignificance.spiritualMeaning: Represents faith, belief, and the journey from doubt to conviction.
religiousSignificance.historicalImpact: Saint Thomas is credited with bringing Christianity to India, where he is revered as a patron saint.

achievements: Third President of the United States
Principal author of the Declaration of Independence
historicFigures.significance: A Founding Father of the United States, Jefferson was a key figure in the early development of the nation.
Edison is one of the most prolific inventors in history, holding over 1,000 patents.
Aquinas was a pivotal figure in the development of Western philosophy and theology.

famousQuotes.quote: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
famousQuotes.author: Thomas Edison
famousQuotes.context: Edison said this in the context of his numerous experiments and failures before successfully inventing the light bulb.

famousQuotes.quote: The tree of liberty must be refreshed from time to time with the blood of patriots and tyrants.
famousQuotes.author: Thomas Jefferson
famousQuotes.context: Jefferson wrote this in a letter discussing the necessity of revolution and vigilance in maintaining freedom.

famousPeople.name: Thomas Hardy
knownFor: Writing novels such as 'Tess of the d'Urbervilles' and 'Far from the Madding Crowd'

famousPeople.name: Thomas Pynchon
knownFor: Writing novels such as 'Gravity's Rainbow' and 'The Crying of Lot 49'

famousAthletes.name: Isiah Thomas
knownFor: Leading the Detroit Pistons to back-to-back NBA Championships
famousAthletes.stats: 19.2 points per game, 9.3 assists per game

famousAthletes.name: Thomas Müller
famousAthletes.achievements: FIFA World Cup Winner 2014, UEFA Champions League Winner
knownFor: Versatile attacking play and goal-scoring ability

famousAthletes.name: Earl Thomas
knownFor: Key member of the 'Legion of Boom' defense

famousAthletes.name: Frank Thomas
knownFor: Power hitting and high batting average

moviesAndShows.title: The Maze Runner
moviesAndShows.characterDescription: The protagonist who wakes up in a maze with no memory of his past.

characterQuotes.quote: If you ain't scared... you ain't human.
characterQuotes.context: Thomas says this to express the natural fear of the unknown and the challenges they face.
characterQuotes.impact: This quote highlights the bravery required to face daunting challenges.

celestialData.moonPhaseDescription: Period of growth, manifestation, and positive energy.
celestialData.compatibleSignsDescription: Fire signs align with passionate and dynamic energy.
celestialData.cosmicElementDescription: Embodies passion, creativity, and transformative power.
celestialData.celestialArchetypeDescription: Bold, confident, natural leader and pioneer.
celestialData.karmicLessons: Embrace courage, develop patience, balance action with reflection

songs.title: Thomas the Tank Engine Theme
songs.description: This iconic theme song from the beloved children's television series 'Thomas & Friends' captures the cheerful and adventurous spirit of Thomas the Tank Engine and his friends on the Island of Sodor.

songs.title: Thomas Edison
songs.description: A whimsical and uplifting song that draws inspiration from the inventive spirit of Thomas Edison, celebrating creativity and the joy of discovery.

songs.title: Thomas County Law
songs.description: This song offers a reflective and positive narrative about life and community in a small town, with a focus on personal growth and the passage of time.
